A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Superior Star Wars!  I usually suffer through Star Wars in spite of bad acting because my kids like it.  Not this one!  Wow!  It stood all on its own as a great movie.  The directing was fantastic.  The characters were so improved in this movie.  We hated all of them from The Force Awakens but loved the exact same actors and characters in this movie. We talked about it for days after seeing it.  I really\, really hope they bring this director back!
